ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Magical drums?
ygData.msgSnippet: are all the coins no drop? if they re not then i ll have no problems at all ... From: Big Daddy Legba [mailto:legba@concentric.net] Sent: Thursday, August 03,
ygData.messageBody:
are all the coins no drop? if they're not then i'll have no problems at all

-----Original Message-----
From: Big Daddy Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 9:26 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Magical drums?


Speaking of which I got my Nostrolo Tambourine last night!!! wooohooo!!!

I'm not sure how hard the COM coin is to get, but you can get the Dalnir,
Kaesora and Overthere coin at 37. The lake coin is easy to get from anyone
camping the goblins (they drop them all the time) and the Emerald Jungle
coin is foraged, so you'll need a ranger or druid to help...
